attributes.action: Return Professor Nutt to his post advising the government on drug policy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I believe that the Professor has been made a scapegoat for simply disagreeing with the govenments position on controlled substances. I dont think the government can expect a body to provide impartial, fact based evidence and then punish it's members for openly stating an opinion contrary to the governments. 

Whilst acknowledging the executives right to disagree with said advice, I dont believe you can punish those who disagree with you in such a manner as has happened with Prof Nutt.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
